description: Legal Subdivisions. Record of current land subdivision and right-of-way. A polygon feature class that depicts data about legally subdivided property and rights of way.  The data sources are formal subdivisions, ordinances, and other official records. Also included are the LEGAL_PLAT table which provides detail about Legal Subdivision Plats and the LEGAL_RW_ADJSTMNT table which provides details about changes in the status of the Legal Subdivision Right of Way via City Council or other official processes.

name: LEGAL
